article_title: State Debate: 'Giddy' legislators are despicable, says the Beloit Daily News; time to fix our roads, says La Crosse Tribune
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Thunderstorms this morning, then partly cloudy during the afternoon hours. High near 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms overnight. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , jerry bader, david shorr, republican, donald trump, legislator, david haynes, tribune, irwin goldman, news

og.description: A daily roundup of interesting newspaper editorials and blog posts from around Madison and Wisconsin.
